name: Beltfed Hellfire
description:
Choose your loadout. 

Fight through destructible environments.

Complete your objectives. 

Fight through the jungle, fight through the northern forest, fight through hell.

Original soundtrack and sound effects by the author. 

Choose weapon: Numbers 1-0(must have selected the weapon)

Reload: R

Crawl/Sneak(hide behind sandbags, and lower visual range for enemies): Left shift

Medkit: M

Detonate Explosives: E

Map/Pause: Esc

This game is a passion project that is heavily influenced by a 1990s abandonware game that I loved as a kid. https://archive.org/details/msdos_Assault_Trooper_1997

All sound effects made using. https://sfxr.me/ A javascript sound effect maker. 

All music is made with Jummbox a Javascript-based music maker. https://jummbus.bitbucket.io/

All sprites were made using Piskelapp a browser-based pixel art editor. https://www.piskelapp.com/p/create/sprite

This game was proudly created using CT.JS https://ctjs.rocks/ and written entirely in Javascript. 

Kyle Bingham 2022.
